title: Stephen Hawking and the Theory of Everything
description:
Stephen Hawking takes viewers on a fascinating journey through the telescopic lens of modern physics to gain a new glimpse of the universe - the nature of black holes, the space-time continuum, and new information about the origin of the universe.

I didn't find the .mkv files released by MVGroup to be useful - that's just not a good format, even VLC has trouble with those files. So I recoded both parts making them AVI files. They're coded using the XVid codec, at 720x406, 30 fps. I've included both parts of this documentary in this one torrent. Also, no silly RARs that don't provide any benefit, and needlessly increase the size of the torrent.

Thanks goes to the original uploader.
ThePirateBay.org Rocks!
